strengths.name: Achiever
strengths.description: People exceptionally talented in the achiever theme work hard and possess a great deal of stamina. They take immense satisfaction in being busy and productive.

strengths.name: Responsibility
strengths.description: People exceptionally talented in the responsibility theme take psychological ownership of what they say they will do. They are committed to stable values such as honesty and loyalty.

strengths.name: Restorative
strengths.description: People exceptionally talented in the restorative theme are adept at dealing with problems. They are good at figuring out what is wrong and resolving it.

strengths.name: Learner
strengths.description: People exceptionally talented in the learner theme have a great desire to learn and want to continuously improve. The process of learning, rather than the outcome, excites them.

strengths.name: Analytical
strengths.description: People exceptionally talented in the analytical theme search for reasons and causes. They have the ability to think about all the factors that might affect a situation.

strengths.name: Individualization
strengths.description: People exceptionally talented in the individualization theme are intrigued with the unique qualities of each person. They have a gift for figuring out how different people can work together productively.
